.. _manifests:

Manifests
=========

The ASDF tags (described by schemas) available under each ASDF transform schemas version are all described
by a single manifest document for that version.

GWCS
----

.. asdf-autoschemas::
   :schema_root: ../resources
   :standard_prefix: manifests

   gwcs-1.0.1
   gwcs-1.1.0

Legacy
------

.. asdf-autoschemas::
   :schema_root: ../resources
   :standard_prefix: manifests

   gwcs-1.0.0
